WizardTD

类 Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Bullet

  • public class Bullet
extends java.lang.Object
    Bullet is fired from the tower to attack a target monster.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Bullet(float x, float y, int damage, Monster target, processing.core.PImage image) 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void checkTargetLost()
      Check whether the target is dead or lost.
      processing.core.PImage getImage()
      Get the image of the bullet.
      float[] getPosition()
      Get the current position of the bullet in pixel.
      boolean isHide()
      Get whether the bullet is hided or not.
      void makeDamage()
      Check whether the bullet reaches the target monster, and make damage.
      void move(boolean speedUp)
      Move the bullet based on the relative angle with its target.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(float x,
              float y,
              int damage,
              Monster target,
              processing.core.PImage image)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPosition

        public float[] getPosition()
        Get the current position of the bullet in pixel.
        返回:
        Position of the bullet in a 2d array.

      • move

        public void move(boolean speedUp)
        Move the bullet based on the relative angle with its target.
        参数:
        speedUp - A boolean that indicates the speed of the game

      • makeDamage

        public void makeDamage()
        Check whether the bullet reaches the target monster, and make damage. The bullet will be hided and removed after making the damage.

      • checkTargetLost

        public void checkTargetLost()
        Check whether the target is dead or lost. When a monster is dead, its hp will be 0 or it will no longer exist (null).

      • getImage

        public processing.core.PImage getImage()
        Get the image of the bullet.
        返回:
        Image of the bullet

      • isHide

        public boolean isHide()
        Get whether the bullet is hided or not.
        返回:
        A boolean of hide status.
